content.instructions: Select the correct response. Then select the I'm done button to check your answers. When you have completed the exercise, select Next to continue.
content.question: An agency may terminate a past practice that is contrary to law, even if the union objects.
content.correct: That's right! The correct response is "True." Please note the agency may be required to bargain over the impact of the change.
content.incorrect: Sorry, that's incorrect. The correct response is "True." Please note the agency may be required to bargain over the impact of the change.
